channel.name: GetOrderDocuments
channel.description: Requests order documents and/or AOE questions for the accompanying order, as follows: ABN - Determines whether or not an ABN is required. AOE - Determines whether or not AOE questions are required for the submitted order codes. REQ - Creates a requisition for the accompanying order, returns the requisition in a PDF file, and forwards the order to the lab for processing (unless submitted in combination with an AOE request that requires AOE questions to be answered).

SOAP query
POST request

channel.name: InitiateOrder
channel.description:
Creates required bundle for ordering from minimal JSON:
{ "PatientID": "SAFE.11111111", "LabToken": "Quest", "LabFacility":"STL", "SafeOrderID": 1, "BillType":"P", "OrderingProviderFirstName":"John", "OrderingProviderMiddleName":"Q.", "OrderingProviderLastName":"Sawbones", "OrderingPrividerNPI":"1111111111", "GuarantorFirstName":"x", "GuarantorMiddleName":"y", "GuarantorLastName":"z", "GuarantorAddress":"111 Lane Ln", "GuarantorCity":"Nowhere", "GuarantorState":"MT", "GuarantorZip":"00000-0000", "GuarantorPhone":"0000000000", "InsuranceCode":"AUHSC", "PlanCode":"111111", "PolicyNumber":"11111111-11", "IncludedTests": [ "HEPC", "AIDS1", "AIDS2" ] }

channel.name: Interp Engine Listener
channel.description:
Listener for the Interpretation engine
Source is HTTP listener It will then call the FHIR server or other servers(?) as needed to get result data It will then interpret the data (yes/no/needs interp) and for the yes/no condition send it back, for needs interp send to a physician work queue.

channel.name: Submit Order
channel.description:
Submits a new lab order, including both Basic Lab Orders and Patient Service Center (PSC) Hold Orders. The Order object contains the inbound lab order message (HL7v2.5.1 OML_O21).
This channel expects JSON feed with all data filled to build the outbound OML_O21 message.
Last updated: March 12, 2017

step.name: Validate JSON feed
OML templates
Iterate JSON resources
MSH segment
PID segment
IN1 primary and secondary segments
GT1 segment
ORC segment
TQ1 segment
OBR segment
DG1 segment
OBX segment
Check for issues
SOAP query
POST request

channel.name: Test LRI ACK Server

step.name: Log Request
step.script: //logger.debug("LRI ACK Server: " + msg.toString());

step.name: Send Response
step.script:
// Acknowledgement response on acknowledgement var getAckResponse = <S:Envelope xmlns:S="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <S:Body> <ns2:acknowledgeResultsResponse xmlns:ns2="http://medplus.com/results"> <ns2:AckResult> <isMore>false</isMore> <requestId>5ef17e767f00010102d4d7e8a1028015</requestId> </ns2:AckResult> </ns2:acknowledgeResultsResponse> </S:Body> </S:Envelope>;
responseMap.put("getAckResponse", getAckResponse);

entry.string:
// Acknowledgement response on acknowledgement var getAckResponse = <S:Envelope xmlns:S="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <S:Body> <ns2:acknowledgeResultsResponse xmlns:ns2="http://medplus.com/results"> <ns2:AckResult> <isMore>false</isMore> <requestId>5ef17e767f00010102d4d7e8a1028015</requestId> </ns2:AckResult> </ns2:acknowledgeResultsResponse> </S:Body> </S:Envelope>;
responseMap.put("getAckResponse", getAckResponse);
